{"id":825348116,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2Â months","timestamp":1666114917,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"10 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/825348116/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Integer","memory":"6.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int reverse(int x) {\n        int sentinel_digits[10] = {2, 1, 4, 7, 4, 8, 3, 6, 4, 7};\n        vector<int>new_numbers;\n        unsigned int new_x;\n        \n        if(x < 0){\n            sentinel_digits[9] = 8;\n            if(x == -2147483648){\n                new_x = 2147483648;\n            }\n            else new_x = -x;\n        }\n        else{\n            new_x = x;\n        }\n\n        int ret = 0;\n        while(new_x){\n            new_numbers.push_back(new_x % 10);\n            new_x /= 10;\n        }\n        if(new_numbers.size() == 10){\n            bool flag = true;\n            for(int i=0; i<10; i++){\n                if(flag && new_numbers[i] > sentinel_digits[i]){\n                    return 0;\n                }\n                if(new_numbers[i] != sentinel_digits[i]) flag = false;\n                ret = ret * 10 + new_numbers[i];\n            }\n            if(sentinel_digits[9] == 8) ret = -ret;\n            return ret;\n        }\n        for(int i=0; i<new_numbers.size(); i++){\n            ret = ret * 10 + new_numbers[i];\n        }\n        if(sentinel_digits[9] == 8) ret = -ret;\n        return ret;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-integer","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
